subject: Re: FW: Digital Marketing Catalogue S4 launch 2024
preview: @joel I'm assiging this ticket to you as I will be on one week leave starting next week Monday.

full_threads.body: @joel I'm assiging this ticket to you as I will be on one week leave starting next week Monday.

Awesome, thank you!

This should be good to go live at 9am on Monday, 11 Nov 2024.

Thanks so much for all your help, have a great weekend! 😊

Christine

Hi Christine, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://stg-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi guys,



The attached is the updated product catalogue mentioned below - this needs to be uploaded and the old one under Vivante deleted and the thumbnail for it updated please.



Thank you,

Christine

@rica (Time: 15mins)

https://stg-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/


For reference lang

Sorry to be nitpicky, but can we please update the image for the catalogue – just so people don’t see April in the image and think they don’t need to download it as they already have that version.
Thanks.


This document has disappeared now. Can this be added back.

Hi Rica,



Just following up on the updates below please?



Thank you,

Christine
Salvador, Christine reacted to your message:
@joel need your help with this. I cannot see the email thread the client is referring to .

Hi Christine,

Yes, we have received it.

We’ll begin working on this and will get back to you as soon as it’s completed.

Hi Rica,

Please find attached.

Did you receive the other one ok with updates for Blu and Local marketing - I sent it right after this one earlier?

Thanks,

Christine

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Christine,

Apologies, but for some reason, I’m unable to see the email thread you sent. Could you please resend the updates you mentioned?

Thank you so much!

Hi Rica,



Hope you are well.



Please find updates below.



Thank you,

Christine

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Thanks Rica,

I have let Irene know, will get back to your if there's further updates.

Thanks,

Christine

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,


Hope you had a great weekend!


Please refer to updates below from Irene.


Thank you,
Christine


From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: 01 November 2024 5:25 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Digital Marketing Catalogue S4 launch 2024


Hi Christine,


Some edits:






Please change the heading to 'Troubleshooting Lithium Ion Rechargeable Hearing Aids'.







Please change the heading to 'Pairing Guide'.





Please remove this document as it's outdated.







Please remove the document as it's outdated







Please remove the document









Please remove this







Please remove this - this should never have been added here!!!
Please update the attached instead.







Please rename this 'Struggling to hear in Noise'
This needs to be updated in all sections it appears in - please check other folders.





Please let me know when these updates have been completed so that I can take another look.
Thanks.




Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris


Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd AU

12 Inglewood Pl, 2153 Norwest, NSW
Mobile: +61 477 722 271
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com





From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>

Subject: Digital Marketing Catalogue S4 launch 2024
